body_html: Yes, I think that should be doable. We can add logic to setUp and tearDown to check if there are any warnings and fail the test if so. Then, tests explicitly swallow warnings when relevant.
body_text: Yes, I think that should be doable. We can add logic to setUp and tearDown to check if there are any warnings and fail the test if so. Then, tests explicitly swallow warnings when relevant.
body: Yes, I think that should be doable. We can add logic to `setUp` and `tearDown` to check if there are any warnings and fail the test if so. Then, tests explicitly swallow warnings when relevant.
